title: Childhood Stories of George Washington
description: This is a illustrated collection of famous stories about the first U.S. president, George Washington. Each story includes examples of how George Washington was an honest person, even as a child.
meta: bucked, harshly, hatchet, honest, president, tumbled
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Cause and Effect : Cause and effect
Initial and Final Blends : Discriminate initial and final consonant st-blends
Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
Periods : Place periods in the correct location within a story

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
